text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump America, until the coronavirus pandemic had been rated one of the most-prepared nations to handle a pandemic, however, America ranks a dismal 43rd in the world for coronavirus testing, on a per-capita basis. Wednesday it was 49th. Trump’s poor coronavirus testing: poor leadership
